meanings.definition: relating to or located near the lower jaw
meanings.sent1: The dentist examined the mandibular area to check for any issues with the lower jaw.
meanings.sent2: She felt a slight pain in her mandibular joint while chewing.
meanings.sent3: The mandibular bone seemed to be in a chatty mood today, clicking with every movement.
meanings.sent4: His mandibular strength was like that of a lion, able to crush through tough food effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The mandibular region, being so close to the throat, is crucial for swallowing food.
